author: nurfikri89
body:
This PR fixes a bug where the cut values between `Tight` and `Loose` working points are swapped for UL 2016 training. 

Issue reported: cms-nanoAOD#583

**if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:**
Once merged, this PR needs to be backported 10_6_X for the Ultra-Legacy NanoAODv10 production.
title: Fix UL 2016 training pileup ID cut values for Tight and Loose working points
